title: Enhancing Customer Experience Competencies: Understanding and Utilizing Airport Runway FOD Detection Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: The importance of foreign object debris (FOD) detection on airport runways and its safety implications can be explained
The fundamental principles and data processing workflows of deep learning-based FOD detection systems can be understood

Within one week, learners analyze two case studies of detection algorithm applications in limited environments (e.g., offline stores) using smartphone-based learning materials (3 types: videos, PDFs, etc.) and submit a report deriving three key insights per case.
Performance evaluation metrics (accuracy, location identification, etc.) of detection systems in real airport environments can be interpreted

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
